special_text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature you control gains lifelink, deathtouch, and vigilance.
[0]: Reveal the top two cards of your library. An opponent chooses one and loses life equal to its mana value. Put that card into your graveyard and the other into your hand.
[-2]: The next time you would create one or more creature tokens this turn, instead create that many 3/3 white and black Angel creature tokens with flying.
